title: America’s Fossil Fuel Ambitions Are Driving Up Your Energy Bill
description: This story was originally published by Inside Climate News and is reproduced here as part of the Climate Desk collaboration. During the 2024 campaign, President Donald Trump promised voters that his policies would lower their energy prices by 50 percent, repeating this pledge in speeches in New York, Pennsylvania and North Carolina. “We will cut energy and [...]

title: Young Generation Must Inculcate Ancient Values And Ideals In Our Present-Day Life: LG Sinha
description: Jammu, Dec 19: Lieutenant Governor Manoj Sinha released the 4th edition of “Kartavya Marg”, annual in-house magazine published by Shri Kailakh Jyotish and Vedic Sansthan Trust, at Lok Bhawan today. The Lieutenant Governor congratulated and extended his best wishes to the editor and everyone associated with the publication. He applauded Shri Kailakh Jyotish and Vedic Sansthan Trust for its commitment and dedicated efforts towards promotion of India’s ancient knowledge traditions, folk culture, astrology, and Vedic sciences, while fostering moral awareness, [...]The post Young Generation Must Inculcate Ancient Values And Ideals In Our Present-Day Life: LG Sinha appeared first on Daily Excelsior.

title: Ancient DNA reveals why some people live to be over 100
description: Italian centenarians have a higher proportion of DNA inherited from ancient hunter-gatherers, and this has been found to be why they live longer than others.

title: Story of ‘first Black Briton’ rewritten by advances in ancient DNA technology - Yahoo News New Zealand

title: Story of ‘first Black Briton’ rewritten by advances in ancient DNA technology
